mapper.insert: INSERT INTO samplefile( sample_no, samplefile_path, samplefile_name, samplefile_ext, samplefile_type, samplefile_size, samplefile_date ) VALUES( #{sampleNo}, #{sampleFilePath}, #{sampleFileName}, #{sampleFileExt}, #{sampleFileType}, #{sampleFileSize}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT samplefile_path as sampleFilePath ,samplefile_name as sampleFileName,samplefile_ext as sampleFileExt FROM samplefile WHERE sample_no=#{sampleNo}
